attributes.action: Help Gillian Gibbons and stop this gross injustice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gillian Gibbons faces a Fine, 40 Lashes or 6 months in Jail in Sudan for allowing her pupils to call a class toy bear Mohammed. 

She is accused of insulting religion and inciting hatred. 

This is ridiculous and barbaric treatment over an innocent misunderstanding. 

Gordon Brown must insist that she is released immediately and all charges dropped. 

This is shameful bullying and an abuse of power on the part of the Sudanese authorities. 

Please sign this petition if you agree.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
